archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L1)(h160) ILS process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The time preparation for 10 Design Solutions is estimated to 2 days to prepare. An average for an analysis is about 15 days (identification of operations, procurable parts, tasks, etc). On top of that, the analysis may take 15 days including the sequencing. --- The main issues are: - Issue on the process: some data are fulfilled by LSA but should be fulfilled by DO ; - Some data are in the documents but should be digitalized (this induce a lot of time without added value) ; - When information is missing or dispatch over several sources from the Design Office, the Supportability Analysis completes the data. Once analysis performed, 15 days to define the sequence in CorePDM. Some metrics for H160: - 60~70 analysis. Supportability organization runs approx. 1 analysis with 5 days of workload; - For Systems analysis, approx. 70 basics systems to be analyzed, and to be added options; - 50 analysis for options have to be run. - So as an average, for one H/C standard approx. 70 analysis with options this represents about 100 analysis The benefits can be estimated from 25 to 30 % in terms of time reduction (from 30 to 20 days) by enhancing the data preparation and continuity.
